page.title: 16LIFESTYLES 2
page.content: {Social Survey Introduction ---To find out the necessary information we designed a questionare and sent these out to parents.We distributed sixty forms and had fifty returns.This is what we found.{ The majority were born outside the village.Very few were born in the village in fact only 6% of the people we questioned were.Most said they preferred kenton to where they used to live.Exeter was found to be the area most people came from as far away as Shropshire people we questioned moved into the village in the last five years.The average number of people in the last family groups including children and parent was found to be four. The most common occupational group were medical next came banking and
